Also, for that dumbass ‘calling out other people to get mad really quickly even though what you said could be akin to burning trash from excluding manly anger juices’ guy who says this isn’t NTR but cheating, then you might just wanna search on the web ‘ntr meaning’. If you’re too high and mighty and still think NTR is whatever you believe, quote from wikipedia: “...Japanese term for cheating or being unfaithful, used in hentai media.” If that’s not enough, from urban dictionary: NTR or Netorare, (jap. 寝取られ, 寝(ne) as in 寝取られ means "sleep", in this case, "the lover's sleeping with someone (cheating)". 取られ(torare) is a noun coming from 取られる(torareru), "have something stolen/robbed"
